exchangeLuckyballComment: Ua e toe fa'atauina au togi mo se Polo Laki.
inviteLuckyballComment: Ua e mauaina se Lucky Ball mo le valaauliaina o se uo.
purchaseGiftCardByPoint: Ua e toe faatauina togi mo se kata meaalofa.
purchaseProductByPoint: Ua e toe faatauina au togi mo oloa.
luckyDrawUseBallComment: Ua e fa'aogaina le Lucky Ball e ulufale ai i le Lucky Draw.
winLotteryPointSubject: Na e malo i le lotoa
winLotteryPointComment: Ua e maua 'ai mo le manumalo i le Lotto.
partnerMailContents1: Fa'amolemole siaki pepa e mana'omia mo le fa'atagaga a paaga ma lafo mai se tali fa'atasi ma le faila o lo'o fa'apipi'i!
partnerMailContents3:
Fa'amolemole fa'apipi'i se kopi o lau ID card po'o lau tusifolau
e fa'amaonia le fa'asinomaga o lau paga.
partnerMailContents5:
Fa'amolemole siaki pepa ma fa'amatalaga e mana'omia
mo le faʻatagaina paaga ma lafo mai ia i matou se tali!
partnerMailContents6: (Ituaiga o fefaʻatauaiga, numera o auala, numera o faʻamatalaga, igoa muamua o le tagata e umia faʻamatalaga, igoa ogatotonu, igoa faʻaiʻu, numera telefoni feaveaʻi a le tagata e mauaina, ma isi.)
partnerMailContents8:
Fa'amolemole lafo mai se numera telefoni e mafai ona e maua
e fesootai ma lau paaga.
partnerMailContents9:
Fa'amolemole lafo lau tali ile imeli ile partner@buflexz.com .
A mae'a ona siaki e le vaega ta'avale le tali, o le a fa'agasolo le su'ega ma le fa'atagaga a paaga.
authMailContents1: Matou te auina atu ia te oe se numera faʻamaonia imeli.
authMailContents3: Ua tu'uina atu se ki fa'amaonia mo le fa'amaoniga imeli.
authMailContents4:
Fa'amolemole tu'u sa'o le numera fa'amaonia e 6 i totonu o le fa'amaoniga
faamalama i totonu o le app pe kopi ma faapipii le numera faʻamaonia.
authMailContents5:
O lenei imeli e mo na'o le lafo.
E le mafai ona tali, o lea afai ei ai ni au fesili poʻo faʻalavelave,
fa'amolemole fa'afeso'ota'i mai i le nofoaga autu o tagata fa'atau i totonu ole app BUFLEXZ.
